entries.target_user: Households with 5+ active subscriptions who have lost track of what they're paying for
entries.core_loop: Connect bank -> Review charges -> Mark wanted/unwanted -> Pre-renewal reminders -> Track savings
entries.evidence_summary: C+R Research: $133/month gap between perceived and actual spend. Rocket Money users report $200+ savings.

entries.target_user: Homeowners and renters with valuable appliances, electronics, and furniture
entries.core_loop: Scan receipt -> Auto-extract warranty -> Store digital copy -> Expiration alert -> Access for claims
entries.evidence_summary: SlipCrate: Average household loses $400+ annually on expired or unprovable warranties.

entries.target_user: People who have tried and abandoned habit trackers
entries.core_loop: Add micro-habit -> Morning check-in -> Mark complete/partial -> Celebration -> Weekly adjustment
entries.evidence_summary: Retention rates decline sharply after weeks; gamification fatigue and wrong system fit cited.

entries.target_user: Overwhelmed knowledge workers suffering from productivity app fatigue
entries.core_loop: Dump tasks -> App surfaces ONE -> Complete or snooze -> Next auto-surfaces -> Weekly review
entries.evidence_summary: Users report spending more time organizing than doing; Notion performance complaints widespread.

entries.target_user: Professionals wanting to maintain relationships but forgetting to reach out
entries.core_loop: Import contacts -> Set frequency -> Receive reminder -> Log interaction -> See dashboard
entries.evidence_summary: Personal CRMs are web-only and sales-focused; mobile sync issues plague current solutions.

entries.target_user: Home cooks who plan weekly meals and want seamless shopping list generation
entries.core_loop: Add meals to calendar -> Adjust servings -> Generate smart list -> Shop -> Save templates
entries.evidence_summary: Plan changes don't update shopping lists; serving size options limited; random list order.

entries.target_user: Thoughtful gift-givers who want to remember ideas year-round
entries.core_loop: Add person with dates -> Capture ideas -> Reminder before occasion -> Mark purchased -> Review history
entries.evidence_summary: GiftList editing bugs; GiftTracker lacks cloud sync; users lose data on phone upgrades.

entries.core_loop: Configure always-through -> App learns patterns -> Batch digest -> Important immediate -> Weekly report
entries.evidence_summary: Notification fatigue linked to burnout; DND too binary; need intelligent filtering.

entries.target_user: Busy households juggling pet care, plant care, and home maintenance
entries.core_loop: Add care items -> Set schedules -> Daily checklist -> Mark complete -> Calendar view
entries.evidence_summary: Users have separate apps for pets, plants, car, home; multi-pet households underserved.

entries.target_user: Avid readers wanting simple tracking without Goodreads social noise
entries.core_loop: Add book -> Update progress -> See streak and goals -> Mark complete -> Review stats
entries.evidence_summary: Cross-device sync requested 35+ times; slow loading top complaint; social features unwanted.
